body.name: N300 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 6 in 1 Ultra-Lightweight Stick Vacuum, 2200mAh Battery Up to 40mins Runtime, Powerful Handheld Vacuum for Hard Floor Carpet Pet Hair Home
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 18 mins
features: 💎One Sentence Summary of Devoac N300 : A Low-cost cordless vacuum cleaner that has surprising performance. Fits most families for daily household cleaning.

【Upgraded LED Motorized Floor Brush】- Compared to the old version, we have upgraded the roller of the floor brush for N300 cordless vacuum cleaner to extend its service life and reduce the possibility of floor brush blockage during use. Built-in LED headlights, the motorized brush head of this rechargeable vacuum cleaner is able to illuminate every dark corner and show out the dust. vacuum can maneuverable 180° swivels sideways and 90°up and down. Upgraded roller brush protects floors from scratches and delivers a thorough cleaning on both hard floors and rugs.

【Surprising Powerful Suction with 2 Modes】- This cordless stick vacuum cleaner features a powerful 175W motor, which provides impressive powerful suction. It can be switched into two modes: Max Mode (20KPa for 25mins), and Standard Mode (15KPa for 40mins). So it can easily capture pet hair, dust, debris, crumbs, pet food, and other messes with ease. Suitable for tasks on the hardwood floor, low-pile carpet, stairs, curtains, furniture, car, etc.

【Large Battery Capacity & Long Runtime】- Our cordless vacuum cleaner adopts a 2200mAh 6-cell rechargeable battery, delivers up to 40 minutes uninterrupted runtime in min mode and 25 minutes runtime in standard mode. It performs well in cleaning stairs, rooms, dorms and all around your house.

【Ultra-Lightweight】- Our Devoac N300 cordless vacuum cleaner weighs less then 3.9lbs. The main motor of the vacuum cleaner weighs only 2.2lbs! You can easily pick it up to clean your house. With a labor-saving battery vacuum cleaner, you can get more out of your time and your arms won't be sore anymore.

【High-Efficiency Filtration System】- With 5-stage cyclone technology and high-density meshing, the cordless stick vacuum cleaner can capture 99.99% of microscopic dust particles as small as 0.1 microns. Thus, it effectively makes the exhaust air cleaner, prevents secondary air pollution, and brings cleaner air to the family. The "One-Button Dust Dumping" design makes emptying simple.

【6 in 1 Multi-function Vacuum】- With an upgraded motorized floor brush, long crevice, and 2-in-1 brush, the pet hair vacuum cleaner can be quickly converted into a portable handheld vacuum or a cordless stick vacuum lightweight. These accessories help clean up debris in the hard-to-reach place. The retractable metal tube is perfect for cleaning pet hair on the curtains or ceiling. The wall mount effectively holds the cordless vacuum cleaner and saves space.
【Warranty】- DEVOAC provides 12-Month warranty service. Our professional team will provide you with the state of the art service for any of your queries. No worry about any after-sales problems!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this vacuum. It is light weight, easy to use, but best of all it has GREAT suction. It is great for hard floors as well as carpet. I can vacuum my whole house with this unit. I like the feature where you can ramp up the suction force with just a touch of the power button. I have never had a problem with the battery not lasting. It is easy to attach to the wall and so convenient to just grab for quick clean-ups! The price is great too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very light and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This vacuum is really light yet very powerful. I am very satisfied with this purchase, price is very reasonable for such a good quality item. I would recommend to anyone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s amazing less sound can use even late night for cleaning no neighbors complain of noise, easy to clean also , reasonable price , easy to carry very light weight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with purchase
reviews.reviewText: Versatile cordless vacuum with impressive suction. I mainly use it for cleaning my car and vacuuming my stairwell. The cordless design of this vacuum makes it incredibly versatile. Its lightweight and can be easily carried up and down the stairs. It efficiently picks up dirt, debris, and pet hair. I've been pleasantly surprised by its performance, especially considering its compact size. I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is very light weight and easy to use! My 5 yr old even loves to use it! I am able to go around my house for a quick clean to get any dirt and dog hair off my hard wood floors with one battery life. The light makes it easier to see under the couch and darker areas and the flexibility makes those deeper areas easy to get too! Easy to change extensions and goes from shorter to longer with ease. Have to be careful as it does not free stand but otherwise I am very satisfied with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this in my office to keep dirt and dust under control. Lightweight and price is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bang for my buck
reviews.reviewText: I bought this vacuum because it received great reviews. When I first received it, I was impressed. It was nicely packaged.I have this product 4 stars , because I wish it had a little more power. The vacuum itself is great and the battery pack holds a long charge and it’s light weight. I would totally recommend this product. It’s a great cordless vacuum to have.
